title: 怎么调服务器头像和标语
author: agh

replies.author: L天乾
replies.txt_content:
下载一个motd插件 
colorMotd http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-448326-1-1.html【推荐】
betterMotd http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-262438-1-1.html
AnimMotd http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-427200-1-1.html
Motdcolor http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-185147-1-1.html
如需更多可以在插件板块搜索MOTD
楼主觉得我回答的可以吗？

replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... highlight=colormotd
